newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.
newsitem.headline: Europe and CIS port conditions - Lloyds.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --
ALBANIA, Durres - June 2 - Six vessels in port discharging of which 3 wheat flour, 1 cement, 1 nitrates, 1 sugar, 2 vessels awaiting berth in roads of which 1 wheat flour, 1 bulk wheat.

BULGARIA, June 2 - Varna - east - 1 vessel loading at berth. 5 discharging at berth. 3 waiting at anchorage to load. West - 7 loading at berth. 1 discharging at berth. Bourgas - east - 16 vessels due. 5 vessels loading at berth. 7 vessels waiting at anchorage to load. 3 waiting at anchorage to discharge. 3 vessels under repairs/drydock. West - 2 vessels loading at berth. Tankers 1 loading at berth. 1 discharging.

May 25 - June 1 - Bourgas - ten vessels operating of which 9 loading 1 zinc 3 Fertiliser, 1 beer, 2 steel, 1 chemicals, 1 petrol. 1 under repairs. 10 vessels waiting in roads of which 5 to load 3 tankers, 1 timber, 1 cars. 3 to discharge, 1 potatoes, 1 fish, 1 paper. 1 empty vessel. 1 to load/discharge general/salt. 16 vessels due of which 5 to load, 1 plates, 1 copper/lead, 1 steel, 1 clinker, 1 copper concentrate. 10 to discharge, 1 zinc concentrate, 1 rice, 3 coal, 2 iron ore, 1 paper, 1 salt, 1 coke. 1 to discharge/load containers.

Varna - 45 vessels operating of which 29 loading, 1 scrap, 1 kaoline, 2 cement, 8 soda, 1 glass, 3 clinker, 5 urea, 1 general, 3 quartz sand, 2 cans, 1 kaoline/zeolite, 1 TSP/urea. 7 discharging of which 1 wheat, 1 cars, 2 rice, 1 apatite, 1 phosphorite, 1 coal. 1 Discharging/loading phosphorite/TSP. 6 discharging/loading containers. 2 discharging/loading trucks/containers. 13 vessels in roads of which 3 to load. 1 urea, 2 soda. 10 cargo not nominated.

CROATIA, June 2 - Pula - one vessel discharging at berth. 1 under repairs/drydock. Rasa - two vessels loading at berth. Rijeka - four vessels discharging at berth. 3 loading at berth. 2 berthed inoperative. 12 under repairs/drydock. 1 anchored. Zadar - three vessels under repairs/drydock. Sibenik - one discharging at berth. 1 under repairs/drydock. Split - One vessel discharging at berth, 1 loading. Ploce, Dubrovnik - no vessels.

ESTONIA, June 1 - Tallinn - City port - 2 vessels due. No delays expected. 1 vessel loading pig iron at berth. 1 liner vessel in port. Kopli - 3 vessels due. No delays expected. 2 vessels loading at berth Of which 1 sawn timber, 1 paper reels. Parnu - 6 due. No delays expected. 5 vessels loading at berth of which 2 timber, 2 peat, 1 building material. Muuga - 5 vessels due. No delays expected. 4 loading at berth of which 1 fuel oil, 1 fertiliser, 1 scrap metal, 1 general cargo. 3 discharging at berth of which 1 paper, 1 poultry, 1 general cargo.

ITALY, June 3 - Naples - One gas tanker berthed. Gaeta, Salerno - no vessels in roads. Genoa commercial port - no vessels in roads, no delays, 22 vessels berthed, 3 vessels in drydock. Multedo oil harbour - no vessels in roads, no delays, 2 vessels berthed. Savona - no vessels in roads, no delays, 2 vessels berthed. Vado Ligure - no vessels in roads, no delays, no vessels berthed. La Spezia - no vessels in roads, no delays, 8 vessels berthed, 5 vessels under repairs/drydock. Leghorn - eight vessels in roads, no delays, 44 vessels berthed. Civitavecchia - one vessel in roads. Gaeta, Salerno, Palermo, Ancona/Falconara - no vessels in roads, no delays. Taranto, Ravenna, Venice - no delays. Naples - one vessel in roads, no delays. Augusta oil harbour - one vessel in roads. Syracuse oil harbour - one vessel in roads, 2 vessels berthed. Sarroch - eight vessels in roads, 1 vessel berthed. Trieste - two vessels in roads, some possible delays at Siot oil terminal.
LITHUANIA, June 2 - Klaipeda - 2 vessels loading 1 timber, 1 molasses, discharging 2 fish, 1 sugar, 2 fish powder, 2 potatoes, 1 vessel loading/discharging, 1 vessel in roads, 26 vessels due.

POLAND, June 3 - Szczecin - sixty-seven vessels due. 35 loading at berth. 28 discharging at berth. 2 waiting at anchorage to load. 10 vessels under repairs/drydock. Gdynia - seven vessels operating. 5 general cargo loading at berth. 2 vessels discharging at berth (general cargo, bulk). 6 vessels under repairs/drydock. 30 vessels due. Gdansk - six vessels operating. 4 vessels loading at berth (2 bulk, 1 tanker, 1 coal). 2 discharging at berth (general cargo, grain). 5 vessels under repairs/drydock. 18 vessels due.

PORTUGAL, June 2 - Leixoes - vessels operating, 8 general cargo, 4 container vessels. No vessels awaiting berth. Places vacant, 5 piers with cranes, 2 without cranes. Sines - three vessels operating of which 1 discharging coal, 1 loading gasoline/gasoil/jet fuel, 1 loading propylene. No vessels waiting. Vessels due, 2 to discharge crude, 1 to discharge coal, 1 each to load gasoil, fuel Oil, gasoil/jet fuel, metallic structures, propane/butane.

June 3 - Setubal - six vessels loading at berth, 5 discharging at berth, 5 under repairs/drydock. Vessels due, 5 for discharging, 4 for Loading, 1 for repairs/drydock. Lisbon - forty vessels due, 1 vessel loading at berth, 4 unloading at berth, 1 loading and unloading at berth, 4 loading at anchorage, 1 Vessel bunkering, 15 under repairs/drydock, 4 vessels awaiting orders, 26 miscellaneous craft.

ROMANIA, June 2 - Constanta - thirty-seven vessels operating of which 19 generals (17 loading, 2 discharging), 6 bulkers loading, 6 bagged chemicals (5 loading, 1 discharging), 3 tankers loading, 2 cement loading, 1 container discharging, 8 vessels waiting in roads of which 6 generals for loading, 1 bulker for loading, 1 bagged chemical for loading. Constantza Sud (Agigea) - thirteen General cargo of which 11 loading, 2 discharging. Mangalia - one Vessel loading general. Midia - four livestock carriers Loading/discharging.

RUSSIA, June 2 - Baltic ports, St. Petersburg - twenty-one vessels operating of which loading, 6 non-ferrous, 4 fertiliser, 1 container vessel, 1 cellulose. Discharging, 2 frozen chicken, 2 container vessels, 2 frozen metal, 1 copper concentrate, 1 dairy products, 1 alumina, 5 vessels awaiting operations, 9 vessels due. Kaliningrad - commercial port, 10 vessels operating of which 8 loading (2 fertiliser, 2 steel scrap, 2 coke, 1 woodpulp, 1 pulp logs), 1 discharging/loading cars. 1 Discharging pellets, 6 vessels due.

Far east ports, Vladivostok - sixteen vessels in port of which 3 passenger vessels, 7 vessels loading (2 General cargo, 1 timber, 4 metal), 1 general cargo discharging, 5 vessels waiting. Nakhodka - nineteen vessels in port of which 13 loading (5 metal, 1 general cargo, 7 timber), 6 vessels waiting. Vostochniy - sixteen vessels in port of which 9 loading (4 timber, 4 coal, 1 metal), 2 containers discharging/loading, 1 cars discharging, 4 vessels waiting. Posyet, Zarubino - no vessels. No delays. No Congestion.

Black Sea, Novorossiysk - 21 vessels operating of which 14 loading, 1 cement, 5 steel, 2 scrap, 1 non-ferrous metals, 1 copper, 1 iron, 1 coal, 1 fertiliser, 1 other, 7 discharging, 3 rice, 1 various, 2 sugar, 1 bananas, 15 vessels waiting in roads of which 6 to load, 1 scrap, 1 zinc, 1 paper, 1 coal, 2 steel. 9 to Discharge, 6 Sugar, 3 rice. 32 vessels due of which 21 to load, 1 scrap, 11 steel, 1 tin, 1 copper, 1 zinc, 3 fertiliser, 2 coal, 1 equipment, 10 to discharge, 3 sugar, 2 rice, 1 citrus, 1 bananas, 1 stearine, 1 vegetable oil, 1 luggage, 1 to discharge/load containers.

Oil Terminal - June 3, 2 loading crude oil, 3 tankers waiting in roads of which 1 crude oil, 1 diesel oil, 1 fuel oil, 9 tankers due to load of which 2 fuel oil, 7 crude oil. Northern basin, Murmansk - two vessels operating of which 1 apatite, 1 non-ferrous metal, 2 apatite loaders awaiting berth, 2 alumina dischargers due.

SLOVENIA, June 2 - Koper - Eleven vessels berthed of which 1 container loading/discharging, 3 car carriers discharging, 1 general cargo Loading rails, 1 general cargo discharging onions, 3 bulk carriers discharging iron ore, coal, tin, 1 bulk carrier loading coal, 1 livestock vessel loading bulls. 10 vessels due of which 2 containers for loading/discharging, 2 bulk carriers to discharge soya, 1 general cargo to load sawn timber, 1 reefer to discharge bananas, 3 car carriers to load/discharge cars, 1 livestock vessel to load bulls, 2 general cargo vessels anchored awaiting cargo.

SPAIN, May 31 - Santander - vessels loading in port 1 sugar, 1 wire steel reels, 1 silica manganese, 1 sepiolite, 1 sodium carbonate. Unloading 1 general cargo, 3 scrap, 1 steel products, 1 pulp sugar, 1 soybeans, 2 cars, 1 oil. No vessels anchored. No delays expected.

June 3 - Cadiz - 21 vessels Operating of which 3 ro/ro, 3 semolina, 2 wheat, 1 shipbuilding material, 1 container vessel, 11 repairs. No delays. Pasajes - 20 vessels in port of which 10 discharging scrap, 1 each discharging coils, magnesite, mineral, sawn timber/logs, woodpulp/granite, 2 discharging/loading cars, 3 loading steel. No delays.

UKRAINE, June 2 - Mariupol - Eight vessels loading at berth (fertiliser, metal products, pig iron containers). 1 fertiliser reloading to sea-going vessel. 4 vessels waiting at anchorage to load (metal products, sulphur). 1 vessel under repairs. 2 vessels awaiting orders. 10 floating storehouses (fertiliser, sulphur). 24 vessels due (fertiliser, metal products, clay, sulphur, coal, general cargo, containers). Kerch - two vessels under repairs. 2 metal products vessels waiting at anchorage to load. 2 vessels due (ore, general cargo/ore). Berdiansk - one vessel loading metal products berth.

Odessa - sixteen vessels operating of which 7 loading (5 metals, 2 oil). 2 discharging sugar, citrus. 3 passenger vessels. 1 vessel waiting. 3 under repairs. 7 vessels waiting in roads of which 2 to load (sunflowerseeds, general). 2 to discharge (sugar, general). 2 cargo not nominated. 1 other vessel. 9 vessels due of which 4 to load (3 metal, 1 urea). 1 to discharge bananas, 2 to discharge/load containers, 2 passenger vessels. Ilyichevsk - eleven vessels operating of which 7 loading 4 steel, 1 oil, 1 potash, 1 spirits. 2 discharging of which 1 magnesite, 1 ferro silicone. 2 discharging/loading containers. 16 vessels due of which 11 to load (1 pig iron, 7 steel, 2 equipment, 1 cars). 2 to discharge cars. 3 to discharge/load containers.

June 3 - Odessa - steel cargo loading, 7 vessels alongside. 1 due. Containers, 1 vessel alongside. 1 due. Grain cargo loading. 1 vessel anchored. 2 tanker loaders alongside. 1 tanker discharger anchored. General cargo 1 vessel alongside. 1 due. Fertiliser 1 vessel due. Bulk sugar 1 vessel alongside. Ilyichevsk - steel cargo loading, 6 vessels alongside. Containers 1 vessel alongside. 1 tanker discharger alongside. 1 fertiliser alongside. 2 ore vessels in port.

YUGOSLAVIA, June 3 - Bar - ten vessels berthed of which 3 discharging bananas, 1 for crew change, 1 loading acetic acid, 1 loading diesel oil, 2 loading gasoline, 1 loading metal, 1 loading hollow section. Zelenika (Bijela) - two vessels berthed of which 1 discharging gasoline, 1 discharging diesel oil, 1 vessel laid up, 3 Vessels under repairs.
